channel.title: Adobe Adobe Experience Manager Security Bulletins
channel.description: Security bulletins and advisories for Adobe Adobe Experience Manager
channel.copyright: Adobe Inc. - Republished for community awareness

item.title: APSB25-90: APSB25-90: Security update available for Adobe Experience Manager
item.description:
Adobe has released security updates. More details in the security bulletin.
Products: Adobe Experience Manager Severity: Important
View full advisory: https://helpx.adobe.com/security/products/experience-manager/apsb25-90.html
item.author: Adobe Security Team

item.title: APSB24-70: Security update available for Adobe Experience Manager
item.description:
Adobe has released security updates for Adobe Experience Manager. These updates resolve critical and important vulnerabilities including remote code execution.
Products: Adobe Experience Manager, Adobe Experience Manager as a Cloud Service Severity: Critical
View full advisory: https://helpx.adobe.com/security/products/experience-manager/apsb24-70.html
item.author: Adobe Security Team
